CustomField.formula: CASE(Owner:User.Business_Unit_Teams__c, "Customer Success", "Customer Success", "Finance", "Finance", "Compliance", "Compliance", "Risk", "Risk", "Salesforce Support", "Salesforce Support", "Beyond Customer Support", "Beyond Customer Support", "LegalCSM", "LegalCSM", "Legal Account Management", "Legal Account Management", "Key Account", "Key Account", "Account Management", "Account Management", "Contract", "Contract", "Product Integration", "Product Integration", "Product Support", "Product Support", "Onboarding", "Onboarding", "Risk", "Risk", "Customer Success Services", "Customer Success Services", "", "","") + CASE(Owner:Queue.QueueName , "Team Customer Success DACH", "Customer Success", "Team Customer Success International", "Customer Success", "Team Account Management", "Account Management", "Customer Success", "Customer Success", "Team Contract", "Contract", "Team Onboarding", "Onboarding", "Team Product Support", "Product Support", "Team Trust Product Suport and Services", "Product Support", "Team Business Development", "Business Development", "Team Product Integration", "Product Integration", "Team Finance", "Finance", "Salesforce Core Team", "Salesforce Support", "Team Revenue Operations", "Salesforce Support", "Ops Team", "Salesforce Support", "Ops Design Team", "Salesforce Support", "Zuora Team", "Salesforce Support", "Team Compliance", "Compliance", "Team Risk", "Risk", "Team Legal CSM", "LegalCSM", "Customer Success Services", "Customer Success Services", "", "", "", "","")
CustomField.label: Case Owner Team
